Top Ability Rules: Gain 80 feet of movement. Draw a card from your deck
Bottom Ability Rules: Gain 40 ft movement
Passives: All movement taken is doubled

Top Ability Rules: Choose a non-instant action from a card in your hand, play it in place of this action. The duration of that card is doubled. Draw a card from your deck
Bottom Ability Rules: Return an active card to your hand
Passives: Can have 2 actives on at the same time

Top Ability Rules: Tokens that would be consumed return to you instead. Draw a card from your deck
Bottom Ability Rules: Consume up to X contact tokens, return X cards from discard
Passives: Double contact token effect

Top Ability Rules: Add X to influence rolls. Draw a card from your deck
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, deal X damage
Passives: Double Influence Range

Top Ability Rules: Add 1D4 to every die rolled. Draw a card from your deck
Bottom Ability Rules: Roll Xd4's. Deal that damage to enemy
Passives: Add 1D4 to every roll made

Top Ability Rules: On next instance of damage taken, take 1 damage for Y rounds instead. Draw a card from your deck
Bottom Ability Rules: For this action, add the defense die of one equipped weapon to the attack value
Passives: You may reroll your lowest defense die 1/rnd

Top Ability Rules: Shuffle hand into deck, then draw X cards. Then draw a card from your deck
Bottom Ability Rules: return a card to your deck, shuffle your deck, then draw a card from your deck.
Passives: Hand size increases by 1

Top Ability Rules: Return any number of active cards to your hand without incurring their costs
Bottom Ability Rules: Pick an active effect. Immediately apply it's effect once more, then incur its cost
Passives: Increase amount of active cards that can be in play by 1

Top Ability Rules: Return a card from Exhaust to your hand
Bottom Ability Rules: Discard a card. Return 2 cards from discard
Passives: Pick 2 cards to bring into combat before drawing your hand

Top Ability Rules: Heal target for 5*X
Bottom Ability Rules: Healing effects heal for 2 more additional points
Passives: all healing effects heal for 2 additional points

Top Ability Rules: Roll attack dice for 1 weapon twice for this attack
Bottom Ability Rules: Increase attack value by X
Passives: Reduce the handed-ness requirement of a 2-handed weapon by 1 hand

Top Ability Rules: Gain the advantage of a consumable without consuming said consumable
Bottom Ability Rules: gain 10 ft. of movement. For every 10 feet of movement this turn, add +1 to your next roll
Passives: Gain a non-card action each turn

Top Ability Rules: Return all consumed tokens for allies
Bottom Ability Rules: gain 10 ft. of movement. Can move X tokens of allies to other targets
Passives: Your contact token buffs apply for allies as well

Top Ability Rules: Increase buff of contact tokens by 2
Bottom Ability Rules: Treat all tokens as whichever token type you want
Passives: Increase buff of contact tokens by 1
